TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MessageSizeExceededException extends Azure.Messaging.EventHubs.Errors.EventHubsException
Public NotInheritable Class MessageSizeExceededException Inherits EventHubsException

Docs.summary: An exception which occurs when a message is larger than the maximum size allowed for its transport.
